description: Helmet Buckle is the plastic clasp that fastens the strap on a structural firefighter helmet.
short desc: Helmet Buckle is is a plastic fastener for a helmet strap.
source: Sampled from a structural firefighter helmet.

measured property.test description: Initial-mass-normalized mass loss rate [1/s] was measured in the simultaneous thermal analyzer experiments at three heating rates: 3 K/min, 10 K/min, and 30 K/min.

derived property.test name: melting temperature and enthalpy of melting
